definition: Able to effectively and skillfully perform tasks or provide knowledge and expertise in a specific field, often used to describe individuals who possess the necessary qualifications, experience, and abilities to carry out their responsibilities with confidence and proficiency.

examples.english: The company provides competent customer service.

examples.german: Er hat sich als kompetenter Experte erwiesen.
examples.english: He has proven himself as a competent expert.

examples.german: Die kompetente Beratung hat mir sehr geholfen.
examples.english: The competent advice has been very helpful to me.
